QuestData.Title: Dropping Bombs
QuestData.Description: The Gordunni have only a single path to their fortress and it is well-defended from a large attack.$b$bThankfully they wont be expecting just the two of us to be attempting to break in.$b$bThis is a great opportunity to take out their defenses and get some target practice for our artillery gunners back at the arsenal.$b$bTake these smoke grenades and use it to call in an artillery strike on their catapults as we head up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Call artillery strikes on the Gordunni Boulderthrower encampments within Gordal Fortress.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that we're inside we have much to do.
